LF012.LF012_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf13"/][UE:Meta key="a97d7f8d1e6e41fa9f8c4e409f839a4b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Oh man![etc:Wait frame="8"/] For a humble real estate agent,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I suuure did cause you quite the hassle,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
didn't I?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a97d7f8d1e6e41fa9f8c4e409f839a4b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]The name's [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf13"/]Chowder[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] by the way.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a97d7f8d1e6e41fa9f8c4e409f839a4b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Don't suppose you've heard of Tulbo Real
Estate?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You haven't, huh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Guess I need
to work on my marketing!
LF012.LF012_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf13"/][UE:Meta key="0d4798b76e4d4f5c996175b6b577f932" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When you're in business as a real estate
agent,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let me tell you...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0d4798b76e4d4f5c996175b6b577f932" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Hearing about new, untouched land really
puts the pep back in your step.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You just
have to go check it out for yourself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0d4798b76e4d4f5c996175b6b577f932" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]After all,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can't give a place your seal
of approval sight unseen![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You've got to
experience it in person first.
LF012.LF012_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf13"/][UE:Meta key="afdbb342eeb7497bbe33773ab9f14be4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I'm alive and well thanks to you![etc:Wait frame="15"/] My whole
life's been a series of things working out.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Like those houses on Moyama.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="afdbb342eeb7497bbe33773ab9f14be4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]I thought I got conned after buying those
old houses,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then the TV reports a boom
in the old-house market across space![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="afdbb342eeb7497bbe33773ab9f14be4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]And just look at what happened this time![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Not only was I saved by you but you're
also investigating the land I came to see!
LF012.LF012_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf13"/][UE:Meta key="395203784a484593b9c73c5ef5f9e272" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Man...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I had this dream of becoming
the number one real estate agent
in the whole universe.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="395203784a484593b9c73c5ef5f9e272" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]Be it day or night,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] weekend or holiday,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd
still call in my employees.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It didn't occur to
me to be an issue, since I was working too.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="395203784a484593b9c73c5ef5f9e272" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I got so caught up in doing it "for the
dream" that I ended up letting down
everyone who worked for me.
LF012.LF012_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf13"/][UE:Meta key="44c192c855b049e585f7427650989669" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]In spite of everything,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my very talented
secretary, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf09"/]Kayz[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], keeps on singing my
praises.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I haven't a clue why.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="44c192c855b049e585f7427650989669" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Not that I mind, or anything!
LF012.LF012_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf13"/][UE:Meta key="fa30e081fb0d4ea58badd3613c3dcfff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I've already sorted out plots for the
Sun-Speckled Terrace.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think it will be
the perfect place to start selling from![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fa30e081fb0d4ea58badd3613c3dcfff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Hmm,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] now for the sales pitch.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] How about
something like,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "Be one of the first to
call this new world home!"
LF012.LF012_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf13"/][UE:Meta key="b49b58aca89049cf8a1b0bd2f18d9728" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Blossoming Arcadia... [etc:Wait frame="8"/]No doubt about it—
what makes this place special is the
beautiful petals always drifting about.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b49b58aca89049cf8a1b0bd2f18d9728" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]You can build a whole subdivision under
these trees with this slogan:[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "Come live
in the town where petals float down."
LF012.LF012_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf13"/][UE:Meta key="3c961414bf4c4dbabfc7adc146f9f246" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]With just a glance you can see that
Serene Shores is perfect for a resort.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
So perfect it already has a foundation![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3c961414bf4c4dbabfc7adc146f9f246" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Makes exciting sales pitches come to
mind.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] "The best summer vacation![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Arrive
whenever, and stay as long as you want."
LF012.LF012_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf13"/][UE:Meta key="d61a645819a2449b9b2e6ab835b8551f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Oh man![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Hero's Hideaway...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Doesn't this
one look like an indoor-leisure facility?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d61a645819a2449b9b2e6ab835b8551f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]If we tag it with "Journey to an unknown
planet!" or something and use Pikmin as
mascots,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's sure to be hugely popular!
LF012.LF012_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf13"/][UE:Meta key="f76e1f9f95424d5c9b9bc5f205673600" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Giant's Hearth already has live coals and
a stove.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You see it too,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's the
perfect campground![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f76e1f9f95424d5c9b9bc5f205673600" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]A magical blaze,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] a refreshing fountain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and a reverberating wild howl.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] "Return to
nature!"[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f76e1f9f95424d5c9b9bc5f205673600" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]But no wandering at night!
LF012.LF012_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf13"/][UE:Meta key="ed3fd6fafac04e90b9033aaf19d96994" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I'm alive and well thanks to you![etc:Wait frame="15"/] My whole
life's been a series of things working out.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Like those houses on Moyama.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ed3fd6fafac04e90b9033aaf19d96994" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]I thought I got conned after buying those

swampland.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] There must be guests
who'll like this kind of place,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="afb3118348c44bb1bc4157de594d154a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Maybe we could promote moisturizing

"Relax amidst this restorative beauty."
LF012.LF012_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf13"/][UE:Meta key="0247ae4de870422382404963bf51928e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Your exploration efforts up to now have
been impressive,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but there are still new
places to be discovered on this planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0247ae4de870422382404963bf51928e" Scale="1"/]Can you imagine trying to find them all?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It could take a lifetime.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Perhaps I should
reconsider my plans to develop land here.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0247ae4de870422382404963bf51928e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I am already working on resort plans for
Conohan.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] But what if someone else
develops this planet?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] What a conundrum.
LF012.LF012_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf13"/][UE:Meta key="27c06e14a42247f4a7cf272ada111f1e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When you're in business as a real estate
agent,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let me tell you...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="27c06e14a42247f4a7cf272ada111f1e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Hearing about new, untouched land really
puts the pep back in your step.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You just
have to go check it out for yourself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="27c06e14a42247f4a7cf272ada111f1e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]After all,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can't give a place your seal
of approval sight unseen![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You've got to
experience it in person first.

LF012.LF012_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf13"/][UE:Meta key="31807b6b790a40e889e2fbbb11666a5d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hello, hello![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You're looking as impressive
as ever!
LF012.LF012_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf13"/][UE:Meta key="78264d3155424dcdbd1659ebea573c53" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Would you consider being our mascot?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="78264d3155424dcdbd1659ebea573c53" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I'll compensate you![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I bet you can't resist
a year's supply of Scrummy Bones!
LF012.LF012_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf13"/][UE:Meta key="dc3aa91f75464112ace04631ba4cd62b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Oh man![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Isn't this something![etc:Wait frame="15"/] What an
absurdly sharp-looking guy!
